data.title: Fresh Patties
data.text: Very fresh nice and hot patties. Gives you a nice Jamaican feeling when you take a bite of one of there patties.

data.title: picking food up for Co workers
data.text: got the special deal for 13$ 6patties mild or spicy and 4 coco bread got it spicy cause I love spicy food from Jamaica queens I luv patties with cheese every week so this reminds me back home staff is so friendly and helpful of what questions I asked

data.title: Stupendous Patties!!!
data.text: I've been coming here for over fifteen years.  I drive 20-30 minutes for their "Jerk Chicken Patties". They are the "Best".  "Spicy Beef" rock too.  Various Caribbean pastries, fruit juices and sodas available.  Many from Jamaica.  Just "take out", there's no room for eating indoors or outdoors and no tables.  Friendly service too.  Located across from a bus terminal at Lauderhill Mall.  Urban Neighborhood.

data.title: Great tasting patties
data.text: I think this is the absolute best place in Broward County to get authentic Jamaican beef patties. When I went to Jamaica with my husband on a cruise we ate patties and both looked at each other and said "mmm, it tastes like hammonds!" So that's a good thing! I am only giving it 4 instead of 5 stars because every time I go here they always seem to be out of coco bread!

data.title: Niceness
data.text: My mother asked me to pick up a dozen Jamaican Beef Patties for her while in Ft Lauderdale.  I can tell you this bakery had fresh everything.  The patties were flakey with a decent amount of beef.  Loved the other baked goods like the gizzada and drops.  I am hoping that they ship because I def would like to order these from home!!!

data.title: It's great to be back, Use to go everyday for lunch
data.text: It is so great to be going back to this bakery, which I use to come for 6 years straight, I had moved away. It's nice to see you still hanging strong. Excellent business, thanks to your staff and service, great food.

data.title: yea there patties the best in lauderdale
data.text: yea there patties the best in lauderdale
